para.caption: API-Change in gui.gtk.GtkApplication
para.text:
Due to a found bug in the gui.gtk.GtkApplication class that was found around July 21, an API change has been made to above mentioned class. The class' constructor now must be passed a reference to an util.cmd.ParamString object which should contain information about the invocation parameters of the application.
Until now, the gtkphp script which is used to launch gtk-php applications did pass a ParamString to the constructor, but it was left up to the derived implementation to process its contents. It was found to be a base functionality, so design was changed to give it up to GtkApplication::__construct(). A reference is now stored in GtkApplication->param, so it is accessible to the whole app.
